Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Waterfront Way between to small shopping centers.
Room.LongDescription: There are two shopping centers on both the north and south sides of the road. On the south side of the road is a large building with three shops in it. Directly to the south is a door entrance to "Richard's Rare Herbs". A distinct yet unknown odor seems to radiate from the shop. On the north side of the road is a sign which reads "Leomund's Water Purification" next to a rounded door. Water purification is a useful idea, but can more easily be accomplished by boiling the water. But as they say, there's a sucker born every minute.
